text: Cyberworthiness is an assessment of the resilience of a system from cyber attacks. It can be applied to a range of software and hardware elements (such as standalone software, code deployed on an internet site, the browser itself, military mission systems, commercial equipment, or IoT devices). ==See also== * Airworthiness * Crashworthiness * Roadworthiness * Railworthiness * Seaworthiness * Spaceworthiness ==References== Category:Information science Category:Computing terminology
title: Cyberworthiness
